solution_line_template: Each animal has {heads_per_animal}+{legs_per_animal}=<<{heads_per_animal}+{legs_per_animal}={total_parts_per_animal}>>{total_parts_per_animal} total heads and legs.
Then there are {total_heads_and_legs}/{total_parts_per_animal}=<<{total_heads_and_legs}/{total_parts_per_animal}={num_tripodauruses}>>{num_tripodauruses} in the flock.
